column5: I went onto their websit and it says they open at 7am.  Does anyone know if they open earlier?  I hae been there right at 7 am in the past and they looked as though they were open for while.  I should have phoned them today but it is too late now and I am going fishing tomorrow am.
Not to worry. You don't need bait on Simcoe!!!
Lou is usually open by 6:30, but last I heard he was out of small minnows and not getting anymore for a while.
